actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to prohibit the operation of motor vehicles transporting hazardous materials by persons not subjected to a background investigation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal transportation law to prohibit a motor carrier from permitting a person to operate a motor vehicle transporting hazardous material in commerce unless a background investigation of such person has been completed in accordance with specified requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to prohibit the operation of motor vehicles transporting hazardous materials by persons not subjected to a background investigation, and for other purposes.
